LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.SliderWarning: Sliders are often dependent on the values of the qualities above and below, try moving those if you can't move one.
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillPo: Minimum skill for at least poor item quality:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillNo: Minimum skill for at least normal item quality:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillGo: Minimum skill for at least good item quality:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillEx: Minimum skill for at least excellent item quality, set above 20 to deactivate:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillMa: Minimum skill for at least masterwork item quality, set above 20 to deactivate:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillLe: Minimum skill for a chance at legendary ltem quality, set above 20 to deactivate:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.LegendaryChanc: Chance for legendary item quality at skill 20:
Legendary item chance scales linearly from 20 to the skilllevel that is set as minimum for legendary.
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.SupressMasterw: Supress the message when a masterwork item is made?
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.SupressLegenda: Supress the message when a legendary item is made?
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.SetQualityInst: Set the guaranteed quality instead of rerolling it? Makes quality chances more in line with the chance that it's set to in this menu.
